prompt:
Given the following ontology and sentences, please extract the triples from the sentence according
    to the relations in the ontology. In the output, only include the triples in the given output format. 
CONTEXT:

Ontology Concepts: Person, InfluenceOnPatient, Patient, Doctor, Child, Father, Parent, Mother, Teacher, Activity, ActivityState, Adventure, OutdoorActivity, ArtCourse, EducationalActivity, BoardGame, GameActivity, CommunityService, SocialActivity, Conversation, FamillyActivity, Cooking, CulturalActivity, CulturalFestival, CulturalLearning, Eating, EnvironmentalProject, Fitness, PhysicalActivity, GroupGame, GroupWork, HomeWork, LanguageCourse, MathCourse, MuseumVisit, NatureExploration, Picnic, Puzzle, SchoolExam, Sport, VideoGame, WatchingMovie, Interval, Instant, TemporalEntity, TimeState, Challenge, ChallengeLevel, AcademicChallenges, ArtChallenges, AuditoryStimuli, EnvironmentalStimuli, ChronicStress, EmotionalChallenges, ConflictWithPeers, SocialChallenges, DifficultyMakingFriend, ExamChallenges, Frustration, GroupWorkChallenges, HomeWorkChallenges, LanguageChallenges, LowSelfEsteem, MathChallenges, PeerRejection, TactileStimuli, TeacherRelationship, VisualStimuli, Diagnosis, Disorder, ProfileState, Symptom, Adhd, AnxietyDisorders, AvoidingTasks, InattentionSymptoms, BlurtingOut, ImpulsivitySymptoms, CarelessMistakes, ConductDisorder, Depression, DifficultyPlayingQuietly, HyperactivitySymptoms, DifficultySustainingAttention, DifficultyWaiting, Disorganisation, EasilyDistracted, ExcessiveRunning, ExcessiveTalking, Fidgeting, Forgetfulness, HyperactivityImpulsivityType, InabilityStaySeated, InattentionType, Interrupting, LosingThings, MixedType, OnTheGo, OppositionalDefiantDisorder, PoorListening, Environment, EnvironmentState, Community, LivingEnvironment, FamilyHome, Garden, PlayingEnvironment, HomePlaySpace, HomeSchooling, LearningEnvironment, Library, OnlineLearning, Park, PreSchool, PublicPlayground, School, SchoolResidence, SportComplexe, SummerCamp, Theater, Situation, SituationState, AcademicSituation, EmotionalRegulationSituation, FamilyDynamicSituation, OrganizationSituation, SocialSituation, TimeManagementSituation,
Ontology Relations: hasAge(Patient,int), hasDateOfBirth(Patient,date), hasGender(Person,str), hasName(Person,str), hasService(Doctor,str), hasInfluence(Person,InfluenceOnPatient), hasActivityState(Activity,ActivityState), hasDay(Instant,int), hasHour(Instant,int), hasMinute(Instant,int), hasMonth(Instant,int), hasSecond(Instant,int), hasYear(Instant,int), hasEnd(Interval,Instant), hasStart(Interval,Instant), hasTimeState(TemporalEntity,TimeState), hasLevel(Challenge,ChallengeLevel), hasType(Diagnosis,str), hasDiagnosisDisorder(Diagnosis,Disorder), hasProfileState(Diagnosis,ProfileState), hasSymptom(Disorder,Symptom), hasEnvironmentState(Environment,EnvironmentState), hasMotivation(Activity,bool), hasActivityType(Situation,ActivityState), hasChallenge(Patient,Challenge), hasChallengeLevel(Situation,ChallengeLevel), hasDiagnosis(Patient,Diagnosis), hasEnvironment(Situation,Environment), hasEnvironmentType(Situation,EnvironmentState), hasPatient(Situation,Patient), hasProfileType(Situation,ProfileState), hasSituationState(Situation,SituationState), hasTemporalEntity(Situation,TemporalEntity), hasTimeOfDay(Situation,TimeState), isEngagedIn(Patient,Activity), isWith(Activity,Person), manifestIn(Disorder,Environment)###Instructions
    -Identify entities in the text and classify them according to the ontology. 

    -Extract relationships as RDF triples in provided format.

    -Ensure consistency with the ontology's definitions.


Example Sentence: Thomas is_A boy born on March 30, 2018, diagnosed with mixed-type ADHD according to the DSM-5, and he also exhibits anxiety disorders. He has challenge in mathematics. On May 21, 2024, at 10:30 a.m., he was in class at school for a music lesson with teacher Sylvie.
Example Output in JSON format : {"triples":[{'subject': 'Thomas', 'predicate': 'is_A', 'object': 'Patient'}, {'subject': 'Thomas', 'predicate': 'hasName', 'object': 'Thomas'}, {'subject': 'Thomas', 'predicate': 'hasDateOfBirth', 'object': '2018-03-30'}, {'subject': 'Thomas', 'predicate': 'hasGender', 'object': 'Male'}, {'subject': 'Thomas', 'predicate': 'isEngagedIn', 'object': 'MusicLesson'}, {'subject': 'Thomas', 'predicate': 'hasDiagnosis', 'object': 'ADHD Diagnosis'}, {'subject': 'Thomas', 'predicate': 'hasDiagnosis', 'object': 'AnxietyDiagnosis'}, {'subject': 'Thomas', 'predicate': 'hasChallenge', 'object': 'MathematicsChallenge'}, {'subject': 'Sylvie', 'predicate': 'is_A', 'object': 'Teacher'}, {'subject': 'MathematicsChallenge', 'predicate': 'is_A', 'object': 'AcademicChallenge'}, {'subject': 'ADHDDiagnosis', 'predicate': 'hasDiagnosisDisorder', 'object': 'MixedADHD'}, {'subject': 'AnxietyDiagnosis', 'predicate': 'hasDiagnosisDisorder', 'object': 'AnxietyDisorder'}, {'subject': 'MusicLesson', 'predicate': 'is_A', 'object': 'LeaningActivity'}, {'subject': 'MusicLesson', 'predicate': 'isWith', 'object': 'Sylvie'}, {'subject': 'SchoolClassroom', 'predicate': 'is_A', 'object': 'LearningEnvironment'}, {'subject': 'SituationInterval', 'predicate': 'is_A', 'object': 'TemporalEntity'}, {'subject': 'SituationInterval', 'predicate': 'hasStart', 'object': 'StartInstant'}, {'subject': 'StartInstant', 'predicate': 'is_A', 'object': 'Instant'}, {'subject': 'StartInstant', 'predicate': 'hasYear', 'object': 2024}, {'subject': 'StartInstant', 'predicate': 'hasMonth', 'object': 5}, {'subject': 'StartInstant', 'predicate': 'hasDay', 'object': 21}, {'subject': 'StartInstant', 'predicate': 'hasHour', 'object': 10}, {'subject': 'StartInstant', 'predicate': 'hasMinute', 'object': 30}, {'subject': 'StartInstant', 'predicate': 'hasSecond', 'object': 0}, {'subject': 'ThomasSituation', 'predicate': 'is_A', 'object': 'AcademicSituation'}, {'subject': 'ThomasSituation', 'predicate': 'hasPatient', 'object': 'Thomas'}, {'subject': 'ThomasSituation', 'predicate': 'hasTemporalEntity', 'object': 'SituationInterval'}, {'subject': 'ThomasSituation', 'predicate': 'hasEnvironment', 'object': 'SchoolClassroom'}]}
Return ONLY the contents in json format strict, without any triple quotes like '```' or any other text.
